description: Three singers from a pop band have doubles lives as they are really assassins at night who are hired to kill a heartless king.
keywords: anime animation,tv mini series,based on manga,hentai
name: Middonaito pansa

review.name: Excellent!
review.reviewBody:
This is one of my favorite hentais, because there are not to much sex scenes and it has a logical storyline!!!!!!YEAHH!!!(and its also really funny) Most hentais haven't a good storyline and its really annoying to see the characters a little bit talking to each other and after that they have sex and then they talk again and have sex again etc.., thats sooo boring without a good story!!!(and they aren't funny!!)

Oh and the most important thing is: The drawings are BEAUTIFUL! Its really rare to find such wonderful drawings in a hentai!!! And also the music or rather the special songs are really good! And a tip watch this hentai in Japanese, the English version is awful
